Name: 生人症候群
About the game: I don't know when all the people around me have become strange. Obviously, the way of speaking has not changed, and the expression of love has not changed, but it is inexplicably frightening, as if it had been replaced by something Strange diseases appeared in this remote seaside town. Under the quiet life, the undercurrent kept surging. Until a red haired girl who called herself 'Monster Hunter' appeared, all the questions were finally answered. Destroy or join eternity. The fate of mankind is never in the hands of individuals. Game elements **AVG alternates with text dialogue mode to diversify the game experience; **High freedom of choice, clues and doubts are controlled by one hand; **Exquisite characterization, rich branch plot; **The content of the script is 50000 words;
